beer.beer_description:
Tarpukario legenda Volfas Engelman su RINKTINIU alumi į šiandien sugrįžo ir vėl kaip anuomet aktuali patapo. Tarpukario Kauno didžiausias bravoras šiuo vardu vadinamas buvo ir populiariausią anuomet Lietuvoje alų virė. Šviežias tada ir todėl šviežias dabar Volfas Engelman RINKTINIS tik iš tyro, specialaus paruošimo vandens kuriamas, prabangą jojo aromatiniai Perle ir Magnum apyniai bei išskirtinės alaus mielės atskleidžia, o lietuviškas Pilzeno tipo salyklas jį šviesia spalva apdovanoja. RINKTINIS – yra bravoro vėliavnešys, jis kaip ir kitos Volfas Engelman rūšys pilamas į pintos talpos butelius, NEPASTERIZUOTAS todėl ir namuose galima jį ragauti tokį pat kaip ir bare.

The interwar legend Volfas Engelman returned to today with RINKTINIS beer and became as relevant as it had been before. The interwar Kaunas greatest brewery was named by the name and cooked the most popular beer in Lithuania at that time. Fresh then and due to that fresh now Volfas Engelman RINKTINIS is created only from fresh specially prepared water, its luxury is revealed by luscious Perle and Magnum hops and exclusive beer yeast and the Lithuanian Pilsen type malt presents it with light colour. RINKTINIS is the banner-bearer of the brewery, it as other Volfas Engelman sorts is bottled in bottles of pint volume, NON-SCALDED, so its taste is the same at home as in the bar.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 35 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 8!
Travel much? You must be a "brewsetter". That's at least a beer from 10 different countries. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_description: Your quest to quench your thirst leaves no stone unturned! That's at least 80 distinct venues!
You're exploring this great country the best way possible, one delicious beer at a time! That's one beer while in at least 45 states or countries. Visit 5 more for Level 10!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 160 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 33!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 100 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 21!

RINKTINIS – yra bravoro vėliavnešys, jis kaip ir kitos Volfas Engelman rūšys pilamas į pintos talpos butelius, NEPASTERIZUOTAS todėl ir namuose galima jį ragauti tokį pat kaip ir bare.

The interwar legend Volfas Engelman returned to today with RINKTINIS beer and became as relevant as it had been before. The interwar Kaunas greatest brewery was named by the name and cooked the most popular beer in Lithuania at that time. Fresh then and due to that fresh now Volfas Engelman RINKTINIS is created only from fresh specially prepared water, its luxury is revealed by luscious Perle and Magnum hops and exclusive beer yeast and the Lithuanian Pilsen type malt presents it with light colour. RINKTINIS is the banner-bearer of the brewery, it as other Volfas Engelman sorts is bottled in bottles of pint volume, NON-SCALDED, so its taste is the same at home as in the bar.

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 245 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 50! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

user.bio: Couldn't be arsed chasing whales anymore and beers are mostly enjoyed with friends
